doc:
Juliette Kaplan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juliette_Kaplan 0 Marlene Juliette Kaplan is a British actress, whose married name is Marlene Hoser. She is most famous for playing the role of battle-axe Pearl Sibshaw in the BBC comedy Last of the Summer Wine, from 1985 to 2010. Marlene_Juliette_Kaplan is a_British_actress , whose_married_name is Marlene_Hoser . She is most_famous for playing the_role of battle-axe_Pearl_Sibshaw in the_BBC_comedy_Last of the_Summer_Wine , from 1985 to 2010 .
